DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ONO-1101 in patients scheduled for multi-slice CT.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of ONO-1101 in Patients Scheduled for Multi-slice CT
DOC.criteria: 1. 2074 years old 2. Heart rate less than 90 beats/min more than 70 beats/min at entering the CT room 1. Previous allergic reactions to contrast agent 2. Renal failure 3. Asthma 4. Other exclusion criteria as specified in the protocol
